title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Elkhorn Ranch Videos
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations     Elkhorn Ranch Videos                Elkhorn Ranch Multimedia                         Elkhorn Ranch: Then and Now Take a virtual visit to the Elkhorn Ranch Unit, and learn about how the site has changed since Roosevelt built a ranch home there in 1885.  Duration:3 minutes, 41 seconds                                Theodore Roosevelt's Home in Dakota Theodore Roosevelt valued the Elkhorn Ranch's remoteness and quietude. Learn about the significance of this special place, and the outside influences threatening this tiny but important part of the park.  Duration:6 minutes, 1 second                                Cradle of Conservation Theodore Roosevelt's experiences in the Badlands of North Dakota deeply affected him in many ways. The conservation ethic he developed while in Dakota Territory influenced his political policies and left a legacy of public lands and resources.  Duration:3 minutes, 48 seconds                     Elkhorn Ranch Audio Guide     This audio presentation provides narrative and perspectives on the Elkhorn Ranch. It includes quotes from Theodore Roosevelt, his ranch manager Bill Sewall, and Roosevelt historian Clay Jenkinson.  Duration:16 minutes, 58 seconds      Credit / Author: NPS               You can download the audio guide in MP3 format. For the hearing-impaired, you can download a transcript of the above audio guide.
